    Package Description
    br.ufmg.dcc.pm.uno.controller
    Package responsible for containing the Controller part of MVC Design Pattern All the contained classes are classes mapped to Views and contains all the logic of the GUI

    Package resposible for storing all classes and interfaces related to a Game
    br.ufmg.dcc.pm.uno.model
    Package resposible for the model part of MVC design pattern.
